name: BoruBoru
description:
A game made during the Weekly Game Jam 101, with the theme "After The Storm".

You play as Auburn whos goal is to save homeless humans after a devastating storm. You pick them up with your trailer and then balance your ride through bumpy courses to get them to safety.
Well... Auburn is'nt the kindest of guys. He actually wants to play basketball with them...

Litterally play basketball. WITH THEM!

And at the same time save them? Enjoyment and heroism combined...?

Design: Alexander Brierly Chramer and Andrew Brierly Chramer
Scripting: Alexander Brierly Chramer and Andrew Brierly Chramer
Graphics: Alexander Brierly Chramer
